Notes: A bird enemy that flies on a path. If the player gets near it, it will drop a bomb that explodes after some seconds. It can be stunned by shooting a Star Bit on it. Can be defeated using most of the player's attacks. Can be frozen by the Orange Luma in SMG2.

Obj_arg0.Name: Flies Higher?
Obj_arg0.Description: If enabled, it will fly far above the actual path. Also disables clipping.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If activated, it will fly away from Mario.

Rail.Description: The path that it flies on.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
